annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Importing specific attributes from a module can help avoid namespace pollution.
label: best_practice
reason: Importing specific attributes from a module can help avoid namespace pollution.

annotation: ⚠️ SAST Risk (Medium): Using wildcard imports can lead to namespace collisions and make the code harder to read.
label: sast_risk
reason: Using wildcard imports can lead to namespace collisions and make the code harder to read.

annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Explicitly managing __all__ to control what is exported from the module.
label: best_practice
reason: Explicitly managing __all__ to control what is exported from the module.
